item.title: Video Color Grading Expert Needed For Music Video - Upwork
item.description:
Hello everyone,

I am seeking color grading / colorization on a music video for a rock song (a single release). I took care to capture the best raw footage I could (shot on an Iphone 14 in ProRes / 4k mode), and am performing the rough edit of the video myself, but the final step of color grading is outside my expertise, so I'm seeking help in this area. I want the final product to look the best that it can, while being true to the style / concept of the video and song. I am seeking someone who is able to approach things not only in a technical way, but also creatively, in terms of finding what suits this video best, aesthetically. I would love to have a conversation about that with you, and hear your ideas / input.

If this seems like a project you would like to take on, or learn more about, please reach out! I've attached a few quick shots from the video in this post. Thank you.

Budget: $300
Posted On: June 18, 2024 23:12 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Color Grading, Video Editing, YouTube Video, Film, Narrative Video, Video Color Correction, Video Cleanup, Video Post-Editing, Music Video
Skills: Color Grading, Video Editing, YouTube Video, Film, Narrative Video, Video Color Correction, Video Cleanup, Video Post-Editing, Music Video
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: UGC Style Explainer Video Content Creator - Upwork
item.description:
Thursday Boot Company is looking for a skilled content creator to produce a UGC style explainer video. The video will be used to promote our product and engage our audience both on our organic and paid social media channels. We would require full usage rights of the final video in perpetuity.

We will provide a script that we would like for you to read and some example videos so that you can see the vibe we're going for. If you would like to discuss styling, we are happy to do that as well.

Example here:
https://drive.google.com/file/d/166lnUeh3yEJ07zEEjiZTut4RjwnEsyVF/view

Budget: $125
Posted On: June 18, 2024 22:34 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Explainer Video, Motion Graphics, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Explainer Video, Motion Graphics, Adobe After Effects
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply
